meanings.definition: A fold of peritoneum connecting the stomach with other abdominal organs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the omentums help support the stomach.
meanings.sent2: During surgery, the surgeon carefully examined the omentums for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The omentums decided to take a break and go on a vacation to the intestines.
meanings.sent4: The omentums were like bridges connecting the stomach to the other organs in the abdomen.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the omentums as friendly helpers holding hands with the stomach and other organs.

meanings.definition: A layer of fatty tissue covering the intestines.
meanings.sent1: The omentums provide insulation and protection to the intestines.
meanings.sent2: After a big meal, you can feel the omentums expanding to accommodate the food.
meanings.sent3: The omentums threw a party on the intestines, celebrating their role in digestion.
meanings.sent4: The omentums acted like cozy blankets wrapping around the intestines.
meanings.sent5: I pictured the omentums as fluffy clouds floating around the intestines, keeping them safe.
